title: 1 Chronicles Quiz - Complete Book
description: Test your comprehensive knowledge of the entire book of 1 Chronicles with 25 questions covering key events, people, and teachings from all 29 chapters.

questions.question: Who was the father of Nimrod, the mighty hunter before the LORD?
questions.explanation: Nimrod was the son of Cush, who began to be mighty upon the earth.

questions.question: Which of the following was NOT a son of Japheth according to 1 Chronicles?
questions.explanation: Eber was a descendant of Shem, not Japheth.

questions.question: True or False: Peleg was named because in his days the earth was divided.
questions.explanation: Peleg's name signifies division because the earth was divided in his days.

questions.question: Who was the firstborn son of Ishmael?
questions.explanation: Nebaioth was the firstborn of Ishmael.

questions.question: Complete this verse: 'The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and ______.'
questions.explanation: Abraham's sons were Isaac and Ishmael.

questions.question: Which son of Abraham's concubine Keturah was NOT mentioned among her sons?
questions.explanation: Naphtali was a son of Jacob, not Keturah.

questions.question: True or False: The sons of Esau included Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jaalam, and Korah.
questions.explanation: These were the sons of Esau as listed.

questions.question: Who was the father of Saul, the first king of Israel?
questions.explanation: Kish was the father of Saul.

questions.question: How many mighty men of valour were among the sons of Ulam, brother of Eshek?
questions.explanation: There were 150 mighty men of valour among Ulam's sons.

questions.question: True or False: The Levites were the only ones allowed to carry the ark of God according to David's command.
questions.explanation: David commanded that only Levites should carry the ark.

questions.question: Who was appointed chief of the Levites that instructed about the song during the bringing up of the ark?
questions.explanation: Chenaniah was the chief of the Levites who instructed about the song.

questions.question: What musical instruments were mentioned as being used by the singers appointed by David?
questions.explanation: The Levites used psalteries, harps, and cymbals.

questions.question: True or False: Michal, daughter of Saul, despised David when she saw him dancing before the ark.
questions.explanation: Michal despised David in her heart for his dancing.

questions.question: What did David prepare abundantly before his death for the building of the house of the LORD?
questions.explanation: David prepared iron, cedar wood, and brass abundantly.

questions.question: Who was charged by David to build the house of the LORD?
questions.explanation: David charged his son Solomon to build the house of the LORD.

questions.question: True or False: God told David he was not to build the temple because he had shed much blood upon the earth.
questions.explanation: God said David was not to build the house because he had shed blood.

questions.question: What was the name given to Davidâ€™s son who would build the house for the LORD and be a man of rest?
questions.explanation: Solomon was the son prophesied to build the house and bring rest.

questions.question: True or False: David commanded the gathering of strangers in Israel to help build the house of God.
questions.explanation: David commanded gathering strangers for the construction.

questions.question: Complete this verse: 'Only the LORD give thee ______ and understanding...' directed to Solomon by David.
questions.explanation: David prayed for Solomon to receive wisdom and understanding.

questions.question: Who was the chief of the sons of Kohath appointed to carry the ark?
questions.explanation: Uriel was chief of the sons of Kohath.

questions.question: Which tribe did Asaiah, the chief who helped carry the ark, belong to?
questions.explanation: Asaiah was chief of the sons of Merari.

questions.question: True or False: David wore a robe of fine linen when bringing up the ark of the covenant.
questions.explanation: David was clothed with a robe of fine linen during the ark procession.

questions.question: Which of these was NOT a musical instrument mentioned in the procession of the ark?
questions.explanation: Flutes are not mentioned; trumpets, cymbals, psalteries and harps are.

questions.question: Who was the son of Jonathan mentioned as Meribbaal's father?
questions.explanation: Meribbaal was the son of Jonathan.

questions.question: True or False: The sons of Benjamin dwelt in Jerusalem according to 1 Chronicles 8.
questions.explanation: Benjamin's sons dwelt in Jerusalem and surrounding areas.

questions.question: Complete this verse: 'And David made him houses in the city of David, and prepared a place for the ______ of God.'
questions.explanation: David prepared a place for the ark of God.

questions.question: Who were the priests that blew trumpets before the ark?
questions.explanation: Shebaniah, Jehoshaphat, Nethaneel, Amasai, Zechariah, Benaiah, and Eliezer blew trumpets.

questions.question: True or False: David offered seven bullocks and seven rams after God helped the Levites carry the ark.
questions.explanation: David offered these sacrifices in thanksgiving.

questions.question: Which family was NOT mentioned as one of the chief families of the Levites in 1 Chronicles 15?
questions.explanation: Ephraimites are a tribe of Israel, not Levites.

questions.question: Who was the son of Joel appointed among the singers?
questions.explanation: Heman son of Joel was appointed as a singer.

questions.question: True or False: David's preparations for building the temple included an abundance of cedar wood from Tyre and Zidon.
questions.explanation: The Zidonians and Tyrians brought much cedar wood to David.

questions.question: Complete this verse: 'Now, behold, in my trouble I have prepared for the house of the LORD an hundred thousand ______ of gold.'
questions.explanation: David prepared 100,000 talents of gold for the temple.

questions.question: Who was the king that danced before the ark of the covenant with all Israel?
questions.explanation: David danced with all his might before the ark.

questions.question: Which of the following was NOT a son of Elpaal, one of the Benjamite families?
questions.explanation: Obadiah was son of Azel, not Elpaal.

questions.question: True or False: Zadok and Abiathar were priests called by David during the ark procession.
questions.explanation: David called both Zadok and Abiathar the priests.

questions.question: Who was the chief of the sons of Gershom mentioned in the ark procession?
questions.explanation: Joel was the chief of the sons of Gershom.

questions.question: True or False: David was clothed with a linen ephod when he brought up the ark of the covenant.
questions.explanation: David wore a linen ephod during the procession.

questions.question: How did David describe the house that Solomon was to build for the LORD?
options: Exceedingly magnifical, of fame and glory
questions.correctAnswer: Exceedingly magnifical, of fame and glory
questions.explanation: David called it exceeding magnifical, famous, and glorious.

questions.question: Complete this verse: 'Be strong, and of good courage; dread not, nor be dismayed: for the LORD thy God is with thee.'
questions.explanation: David encouraged Solomon with these words.

questions.question: Which one of these was NOT a son of Midian, the son of Keturah?
questions.explanation: Eliphaz was a son of Esau, not Midian.

questions.question: True or False: The sons of Saul included Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
questions.explanation: These were Saul's sons as listed.

questions.question: Who were the doorkeepers for the ark during its procession to Jerusalem?
questions.explanation: Berechiah and Elkanah served as doorkeepers for the ark.

questions.question: True or False: David was the direct descendant of Abraham through Isaac and Jacob.
questions.explanation: David descended through Isaac and Jacob as recorded.

questions.question: Who instructed about the song because he was skillful?
questions.explanation: Chenaniah was the chief who instructed about the song.

questions.question: Complete this verse: 'For because ye did it not at the first, the LORD our God made a ______ upon us.'
questions.explanation: The LORD made a breach upon them because they did not seek Him after the due order.
